title: Antroduction to Brain Anatomy
subject: Neuroanatomy
description: Learn about the main parts of the brain and their functions
notes: The brain has three main parts: cerebrum, cerebellum, brainstem
The frontal lobe is responsible for decision-making and movement control

flashcards.back: Largest part of the brain, responsible for thinking, memory, and voluntary
CerebellumControls balance, coordination, and fine motor skills
Controls basic life functions like breathing, heart rate, and digestion
Responsible for decision-making, planning, and voluntary movement
Processes sensory information such as touch, temperature, and pain
Responsible for hearing, memory, and language comprehension
Connects the two brain hemispheres and allows them to communicate
Involved in emotions such as fear and pleasure

choices: Below the cerebrum, connecting to the spinal cord

quiz.q: 15. Which part of the brain is responsible for language comprehension?
16. Which structure is associated with fear and pleasure?
17. The parietal lobe is found:
choices: At the back of the brain

quiz.q: 18. Which part of the brain controls voluntary movements?
19. The frontal lobe is located:
choices: At the back of the head
